name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Skilled in Java, **Spring Boot**, **Spring Core**, and **RESTful APIs**, with 13+ years of experience as a Full Stack Developer delivering high-performance applications in healthcare and financial industries. Proficient in **Azure**, **CI/CD**, and **Azure DevOps**, with a solid understanding of microservices architecture and **Kubernetes** for container orchestration. Well-versed in security protocols, including **OAuth2**, **JWT**, and **OWASP** best practices. Experienced in database management with **SQL** and **Cosmos DB**, ensuring robust data access with **Spring Data Access**.
Dynamic in leveraging AI/ML technologies for predictive analytics and automation, with expertise in deploying cloud-native systems and implementing event-driven architectures. Strong background in MLOps practices, including model training and orchestration utilizing tools like MLflow and Airflow.
